name: Love love demon ji-恋恋妖姬
name_original: Love love demon ji-恋恋妖姬
description:
Five major features of the game:
1. The world of the demon is also accompanied by the enchantress beauty! Find the one who belongs to you!
2. Each character has an animation that lures you! !
3. Each character has a coquetry posture! !
4. Each character has a cute nickname! !
5. Fun jigsaw puzzles, test your wisdom and patience, enjoy the step by step challenge to unlock the mystery of the enchantress girls!

1. Ten different characters! ! Seductive CG! ! . . . . .
2. Each character has a fascinating rich micro-expression, natural movements, whether it is gentle waving to you or fierce resistance, it makes people spurt, anyway, you want all!
3. The beauty enchantress is squatting in your ear when interacting with you, and sometimes breathing loudly in the fierce, letting you be there.
4. Each challenge scene will randomly locate the puzzle, challenge your patience, and believe that you will successfully pass the customs.
5. The most interesting jigsaw puzzle, casual and brain-burning, you will be passionate about winning every enchantress beauty.
